2. The role of condenser lens is:

answers.a: to protect the sample from the illumination source
answers.b: to form a magnifying image of the specimen
answers.c: to focus the light rays onto the specimen
answers.d: to improve the resolution of the image

questions.question: 3. Which objective lens will have high magnifying power

answers.a: lens with a short focal length but kept in air
answers.b: lens with a large focal length but immersed in oil
answers.c: lens with a large focal length but kept in air
answers.d: lens with a short focal length but immersed in oil
